"A.P.241/10/15/10:00": "I see... It seems that it will take time to fully investigate that world."
"First Luther, now Gettemhart... I don't understand this at all."
"Just when you think you helped rebuild one nation, now we're fighting in another. I'm starting to go crazy."
"The history of man is the history of war. Just like the history of ARKS and Darkers."
"While they say we're at a time of peace, but if a battle goes on... I wonder if it's like this for other worlds?"
"Everywhere is much like everywhere else. Hence why I think Omega is going through a similar situation."
"Xiao, what's the situation in this world?"
"The Black Hole is still expanding. Surrounding worlds near it, are being swallowed."
"The speed it's growing at, is extraordinary. It's a rather tough situation to be optimistic."
"D-Darker readings have been detected in the residential area! There was no prior detection, they just suddenly appeared!"
"Issuing a sortie order to all ARKS... They were very sudden, able to mask their presence, be on your watch."
